scripts.build: npm run build:happ && npm run build:ui
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:dna && hc app pack ../workdir
scripts.build:dna: npm run build:zome && hc dna pack ../dnas/kanban
scripts.dev:watch: echo "starting ui UI_PORT=$UI_PORT APP_PORT=$APP_PORT" && run-singleton "PORT=$UI_PORT SVELTE_APP_APP_ID="kanban$APP_PORT" SVELTE_APP_APP_PORT="$APP_PORT" SVELTE_APP_ADMIN_PORT="$ADMIN_PORT" rollup -c -w"
scripts.dev: echo "starting ui UI_PORT=$UI_PORT APP_PORT=$APP_PORT" && PORT=$UI_PORT SVELTE_APP_APP_ID="kanban$APP_PORT" SVELTE_APP_APP_PORT="$APP_PORT" SVELTE_APP_ADMIN_PORT="$ADMIN_PORT" rollup -c
scripts.package: rimraf ui.zip && rimraf public/build && rollup -c && cd ./public && bestzip ../ui.zip *
